source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_000<tab>'Lo there, stranger. You don't look like one of those guard types. What brings you to our humble home?
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_000よう、見かけねえ顔だな……
衛兵ってわけじゃなさそうだ。
サレン郷に何の用だい？

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_020<tab>Those Eulmoran bastards are strutting around Laxan Loft like they own the place. Why the rich can't just keep to their own cities, wearing their fancy clothes and eating their fancy foods, is beyond me.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_020ユールモアの連中が、ラクサン城の辺りに駐留してるらしいな。
まったく嫌になるぜ……金持ち連中は大人しく、
テメェらの街に閉じこもっていればいいのによ。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_030<tab>'Lo there, stranger. You don't look like one of those guard types. What brings you to our humble home?
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_030よう、見かけねえ顔だな……
衛兵ってわけじゃなさそうだ。
サレン郷に何の用だい？

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_050<tab>The Ostall Imperative took a dreadful beating when the sin eaters came. We were far enough away that they left us alone, and I thank the gods for that. As you might imagine, fishermen aren't much for fighting.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_050罪喰いの襲撃で、
オスタル厳命城の方は、かなりの被害を受けたらしいな。
この周辺は、被害を免れたが……やるせないぜ。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_060<tab>'Lo there, stranger. That blasted Light is back in the skies again, and I reckon it bodes ill. What brings you to Sullen in these uncertain times?
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_060おう。
また空に光が溢れ出したっていう時に、サレン郷に何の用だ？

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_070<tab>...Hm? Well, I'll be! It's the gods-honest Warrior of Darkness, in the flesh! Whatever has this humble huntsman done to earn the honor of your company?
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_070よお……お、お、お前さん、闇の……！？
ウオオオオオッ！　な、なんて運がいいんだ！
「闇の戦士」様が、オレに声をかけてくれるなんて……ッ！
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_200<tab>Me? Mostly, I just stand guard here to see that wild beasts, pirates, and other unsavory types don't wander their way to the islands beyond me. There are children and elderly types there, and I do what I can to keep them safe.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_200オレはここで、怪しい奴が島に立ち入らねえか見張ってるんだ。
この奥の島には、戦えない子どもや老人も多いもんでな。
賊や魔物が入り込まないよう、気を配らないといけねえんだ。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_201<tab>Needless to say, the strong smell of dried fish─a local delicacy─has a way of inviting would-be intruders. Hells, if I didn't live here, I'd like as not be one of them. It's that good, I say.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_201なんせそこいらで魚を干してるからな。
匂いに釣られて、魔物が入り込むことも珍しくねえんだ。
まあ、その気持ちもわかるぜ……オレも魚が大好物だからよ。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_210<tab>Needless to say, the strong smell of dried fish─a local delicacy─has a way of inviting would-be intruders. Hells, if I didn't live here, I'd like as not be one of them. It's that good, I say.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_210なんせそこいらで魚を干してるからな。
匂いに釣られて、魔物が入り込むことも珍しくねえんだ。
まあ、その気持ちもわかるぜ……オレも魚が大好物だからよ。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_220<tab>To tell the truth, I always feared a sin eater might show up one day and give me more than I could handle. But I reckon they're not quite so terrible the threat they once were. You've done us all a great service...Warrior of Darkness.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_220「闇の戦士」様が光を払ってくれるまでは、
罪喰いが来ないか、実はずっと不安だったんだよ……。
でも、これからはその危険も減るんだろ！？　ありがとう！

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_400<tab>Sullen's just a humble fishing hamlet─no more, no less. It's made up of four islands─Weed, Brick, Knot, and Lap─connected to one another by a series of bridges.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_400見ての通りの漁村だ。
ウィード島、ブリック島、ノット島、ラップ島という4つの島を、
橋で結ぶことで、ひとつの集落にしているのさ。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_401<tab>It got its name from the dour expressions that our fishermen sport most of the time. But don't let the frowns and brusque words deceive you. More often than not, they're kind and caring people at heart.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4SULLEN_00589_SIGURTHUR_000_401漁師ってのは、しかめっ面の愛想なしが多いから、
誤解されがちなんだが……皆、気のいい連中ばかりだぜ。
よかったら、気軽に声をかけてやってくれよな。
